summary.span: 抽象基底類別 (Abstract Base Class) 提供給所有的選項物件。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for all options objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定 WMI 內容物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a WMI context object.

summary.span: 這是名稱值配對清單，將要傳送至 WMI 提供者 (Provider)，支援自訂作業的內容資訊。

span.span: This is a name-value pairs list to be passed through to a WMI provider that supports context information for customized operation.

value.span: 傳回 ，內含 WMI 內容資訊。

span.span: Returns a that contains WMI context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 名稱 / 值配對清單，傳遞到 WMI 提供者可支援自訂作業的內容資訊。A name-value pairs list to be passed through to a WMI provider that supports context information for customized operation. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

span.span: Indicates that no timeout should occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值可用於搭配屬性。This value is used with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至作業的逾時。

span.span: Gets or sets the time-out to apply to the operation.

summary.span: 請注意，對於傳回集合的作業來說，這個逾時會經由產生的集合套用至列舉，而不是作業本身 ( 屬性會為後者使用)。

span.span: Note that for operations that return collections, this time-out applies to the enumeration through the resulting collection, not the operation itself (the property is used for the latter).

summary.span: 這個屬性是用來指示作業應該半同步執行。

span.span: This property is used to indicate that the operation should be performed semi-synchronously.

value.span: 傳回 ，定義要套用至作業的逾時時間。

span.span: Returns a that defines the time-out time to apply to the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用於對應的半同步作業的下列類別： ， ， ， ， ，和。The property is used in the corresponding semi-synchronous operation for the following classes: , , , , , and . 這個屬性沒有任何作用方法。This property has no effect on the method. ## 屬性值Property Value 這個屬性的預設值是，這表示此作業將會封鎖。The default value for this property is , which means the operation will block. 指定的值必須是正數。The value specified must be positive. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
